backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a styling update to the landing page CTA button with related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark mode with custom OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting dark theme, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling header and all marketing sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Responsive navigation bar with scroll-based styling, mobile menu, and smooth section navigation.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Scroll: Utility for smooth scrolling to sections with fixed-header offset.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Marketing section components including Hero with bold white CTA button and themed content blocks.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThemeT: Shared theme constants for spacing, container styles, gradients, and neon shadow presets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor, updating when Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global styles, and a neon dark theme using CSS variables, plus custom utilities like neon glow and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions, neon-themed colors, custom shadows, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current state, including summary, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features.
